article_title: Billionaire Larry Robbins' Top Five Stocks

article_metadata.description: Today is the Sohn Investment Conference in New York, where many of the top billionaire investors and hedge fund managers give their outlook on the stock market, the economy and talk about their favorite long and short picks. Billionaire Larry Robbins, who kicks off the conference as first speaker, has made [...]
